rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0001
rows.name: Hraaaaah!!!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0002
rows.name:
What's the matter
Jikarao?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0003
rows.name:
You're all pumped up, but
what exactly are you planning?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0004
rows.name: I want to talk with people.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0005
rows.name: But everyone gets scared of me.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0006
rows.name:
The truth is, I'm not scary at all
I want everyone to understand that.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0007
rows.name:
It's true that Jikarao is a gentle Blade
who even avoids stepping on
ants crossing his path.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0008
rows.name:
Talking to people so they can
get to know what kind of Blade you are
is definitely a good idea.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0009
rows.name:
I'm sure people will get the message
you're a big softy
if you talk a bit more.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0010
rows.name:
I hope your personality comes across
by talking a lot.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0011
rows.name:
Once they chat with you they'll quickly
see what you're really like.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0012
rows.name:
But normal conversation seems
difficult for you. Especially when
you're all worked up like before!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, everyone just runs away...
That's what troubles me...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0014
rows.name: Do you have any clever solutions...?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0015
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0016
rows.name:
What about helping
that crying child over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0017
rows.name:
How about helping
that troubled elderly person?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0018
rows.name: That's right[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0019
rows.name: Why don't you help that crying child?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0020
rows.name:
How about helping that
troubled elderly person?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0021
rows.name: Hmm[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0022
rows.name:
How about helping that crying
child over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0023
rows.name:
How about assisting that
elderly person in trouble?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0024
rows.name: Let's see now...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0025
rows.name: Why not help that crying kid over there?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0026
rows.name:
Why not help that elderly
person having trouble?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0101
rows.name: Great idea!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0102
rows.name:
If you help someone in need people
will definitely see how kind you are!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0103
rows.name:
Got it
I'll help them...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0104
rows.name: Tora, please come with me[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0105
rows.name: Got it!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0106
rows.name:
Waaah!
Uwaaah!!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0107
rows.name:
What's the matter?
Why all the tears?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0108
rows.name: My mommy disappeared...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0109
rows.name: Are you lost...?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0110
rows.name:
Wah!
A-a monster!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0111
rows.name: No! No monster!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0112
rows.name:
I might look like a monster
but I'm not one, I promise!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0113
rows.name:
I don't eat humans
You can relax!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0114
rows.name: *sob*

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0115
rows.name:
Jikarao... Saying things like that
only makes it worse.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0116
rows.name:
S-sorry...
Tora, please look after the child.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0117
rows.name: I'll go look for the child's parents...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0118
rows.name:
Hold on!
What are you doing with my child!?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0119
rows.name: Perhaps, you're the mother?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0120
rows.name:
Monster!?
Somebody help!!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0121
rows.name:
What?
...No, that's wrong.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0122
rows.name:
Help, someone!
This monster is trying
to devour my child!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0123
rows.name: No! Ah!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0124
rows.name:
I'm not a monster!
...That's wrong!!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0125
rows.name:
Jikarao!
You need to calm down!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0126
rows.name:
Eeeek! It's attacking me!
Someone get help, quick!!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0127
rows.name:
...Uuuugh
Raaaaaargh!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0128
rows.name: Kyaaaaa!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0129
rows.name: Don't, Jikarao!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0130
rows.name:
You'll only frighten them more
if you get loud!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0131
rows.name: Mama!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0132
rows.name: We need to get out of here, now!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0133
rows.name: ...Well, that didn't go well

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0134
rows.name:
Sigh...
I messed up again...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0135
rows.name:
Hey, don't beat yourself up about it.
You didn't mean it.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0136
rows.name:
Just take your time letting
people understand you

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0137
rows.name:
Hey, don't take it so hard.
You messed up 'cos you were daft,
not 'cos you did anything bad.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0138
rows.name:
Just give people time
to understand you better.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0139
rows.name:
Don't be so downcast
Today was just an unfortunate misstep.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0140
rows.name:
You just need to give everyone
time to understand you.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0141
rows.name:
No need to look so glum
Today was just one little slip-up.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0142
rows.name:
Just give folks time
to get to know the real you.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0143
rows.name: Thank you...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0144
rows.name: I won't give up.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0145
rows.name:
I'll definitely make friends
with everyone...!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0201
rows.name: Very good!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0202
rows.name:
If you help someone in need
people will surely see how kind you are!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0203
rows.name:
Jikarao,
come with Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0204
rows.name: Hehe. Yeah!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0205
rows.name: Ahhh...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0206
rows.name: What's the matter, ma'am?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0207
rows.name:
Oh, I'm trying to get back home
but I'm not feeling too well...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0208
rows.name:
I already have poor eyesight[ML:Dash ]
and when I'm unwell, I can't
see things properly.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0209
rows.name:
That sounds risky.
Let me escort you.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0210
rows.name:
Oh my, how kind.
Thank you very much.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0211
rows.name: Are you able to walk?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0212
rows.name: Yes, I can manage that much...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0213
rows.name:
Oh my?
What could this be?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0214
rows.name: A rock in a place like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0215
rows.name: That's part of my body.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0216
rows.name:
My my, amazing
You have quite a sturdy body, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0217
rows.name: Yeah, make sure to hold on firmly.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0218
rows.name: What the heck is that thing!?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0219
rows.name: It's a monster!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0220
rows.name:
My, there seems to be
some commotion around us?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0221
rows.name:
It's nothing important
Just rumors of a monster.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0222
rows.name:
Oh dear, how frightening
We should get away quickly...

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0223
rows.name:
Don't worry
I'll keep you safe!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0224
rows.name:
My my!
How reliable[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0225
rows.name: Is this your house?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0226
rows.name:
Yes, that's correct
You've been such a great help.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0227
rows.name: Excuse me... may I ask your name...?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0228
rows.name: I am Jikarao.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0229
rows.name:
Oh, that's a funny name...
But thank you, Jikarao-san!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0230
rows.name: Sure thing! Stay well!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0231
rows.name: Good job, Jikarao.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0232
rows.name:
If you keep this up
people will definitely
see how kind you are.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0233
rows.name: You did great, Jikarao.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0234
rows.name:
Keep this up and everyone
will see how kind you truly are.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0235
rows.name:
Jikarao, you were able
to help someone well.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0236
rows.name:
If you keep doing this, people will
surely recognize your kindness.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0237
rows.name:
Jikarao,
you did your best, didn't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0238
rows.name:
Keep this up and I bet everyone
will see how kind you are.

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0239
rows.name:
Yeah!
I'll do my best!

rows.label: kizunatalk057_msg0240
rows.name: Everyone, thank you!
